import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { storeRemoveProduct, incrementQuantity, decrementQuantity } from '../state/cartSlice'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router'; export default function Cart() { const cartProduct = useSelector((state) => state.cart); let navigate = useNavigate(); let dispatch = useDispatch(); function handleIncrement(productId) { dispatch(incrementQuantity(productId)); } function handleDecrement(productId) { dispatch(decrementQuantity(productId)); } function handleBuy() { navigate('/registrationform'); } let subtotal = cartProduct.reduce((total, product) => total + product.price * product.quantity, 0); return (
